post:
KVM Based Fully Managed Virtual Private Servers with cPanel/WHM Control Panel

About HostXNow

Over 10 Years in the web hosting industry
24/7/365 Support - email, ticket and live chat available.
Free cPanel account migration (we will migrate your current cPanel accounts, free of charge!)

Our Fully Managed VPS includes live monitoring, unlimited system administration hours, full root access and free offsite backups

Our UK VPS Hosting Servers are designed for users who need a little more power out of their hosting. These Managed UK KVM SSD VPS Hosting plans are perfect for anyone who wants full root access to their server. As they are fully managed, this allows you to gain the control you need while still keeping a little extra support to help you accomplish your goals much faster, making them perfect for website owners who are not too familiar with the server-side of web hosting. That is not all; we include FREE SSLs for all domains hosted on our Virtual Private Servers.

Hosted on the very best enterprise-grade infrastructure and equipped with high-speed RAID10 PURE SSD storage and each VPS with Unmetered Bandwidth on 1Gbps Uplink Port; rest assured we have cut no corners with our setup to ensure you get the best service possible.

All VPS servers run CentOS 7 and include a free cPanel/WHM license due to high performance and features they offer.

Setup of your VPS, security, data transfers, management of preinstalled software, operating system and any troubleshooting is provided free of charge.

Here are some of the things you can expect from us:
  • We will install/configure a free firewall
  • We will make sure your kernel is upgraded, and OS is patched regularly
  • We include 100GB free offsite backup storage hosted in an entirely different data centre for extra peace of mind via our backup storage service StorageSpider!
  • On request, we can configure a backup system for you free of charge and can restore backups whenever you need them!
  • We make sure cPanel/WHM is updated whenever updates become available. The same goes for PHP/MySQL updates
  • We can troubleshoot high server loads for you as well as detect and remove viruses and malware too.
Our Support

24/7/365 Support
Email, Ticket and Live Chat Support
UK based and English speaking support team

Data Centre

Our UK based KVM VPS servers are located at the Maidenhead Data Centre in Maidenhead, Berkshire, England.
